name: Crossout: Triad - The Keeper pack
summary: Armoured vehicle Harmony; Unique weapon of epic rarity Yongwang; Unique portrait Munmu; Paint can Dark gold; 1500 in-game coins; Cabin Pilgrim of special rarity; Small track of epic rarity (2 pcs.); Hardened track of epic rarity, (2 pcs.) ;Increases the maximum number of parts used to 62.
